comments:
Build log errors. Also, replace topicExtension with contribution in \org.eclipse.tptp.test.doc.isv\contentExtension.xml.

These errors are causing the following exception when opening the Testing applications >> Testing applications >> Datapool structure document: org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: The element type "div" (In reply to comment #0)

Copyright year updates will be handled under defect https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=186431.

(In reply to comment #1)

Removal of the deprecated element will be handled under defect https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=186435.

(In reply to comment #2)

A similar exception is throwing when openinging:

Testing applications >> Testing performance >> Editing a test
I have reviewed and tested this patch. It looks good.

(In reply to comment #8)
> I have reviewed and tested this patch. It looks good.
> 

Thanks Liz!

Patched files checked in to CVS (HEAD).

Requested inclusion in the Monday 4.4 i3 candidate driver.
Reporter: Please verify and close in preparation for shutting down the TPTP 4.4 release.  Thanks.
